ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

This repository provides a real-time text-to-speech service for YouTube live streams, converting chat messages into spoken audio using ElevenLabs AI voices. It features a web dashboard for configuration and monitoring, with options for customization, spam protection, and cross-platform compatibility.

ShowUI-Aloha is a human-taught computer-use agent for Windows and macOS that learns workflows from recorded demonstrations. It generalizes these learnings to plan and execute new task variants, performing OS-level actions like clicks, typing, and scrolling.

This Python tool records TikTok live streams, capturing both audio and video. It allows users to save and revisit live content for later viewing or analysis, serving creators, researchers, and general users interested in preserving TikTok live moments.
